<s>[INST] What is Plutus Core?[/INST] Plutus Core is a variant of the lambda calculus, serving as the assembly language for writing scripts in the Plutus Platform.</s>
<s>[INST] What are the key features of Plutus Core?[/INST] Plutus Core is designed for simplicity, determinism, and allows for careful control of program execution costs.</s>

<s>[INST] Why is Plutus Core not meant to be written by humans?[/INST] Plutus Core is designed to be written by a compiler, making it easier to generate code from higher-level languages like Haskell.</s>

<s>[INST] How does Plutus Tx support writing applications with Haskell and Plutus Core?[/INST] Plutus Tx provides a compiler from a subset of Haskell to Plutus Core, allowing developers to write applications in Haskell while compiling part of the code to on-chain Plutus Core and part into an off-chain application.</s>
